EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, 29 PERSONS ON BOARD, ADRIFT
   IN 33-30.00N 018-43.00E AT 120753Z NOV.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO JRCC LIBYA, PHONE: 2189 1034 9739,
   2182 1444 9149, 2182 1717 3377,
   2182 1444 9488, FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
   E-MAIL: LCG.OPS.RM@MOD.GOV.LY,
   LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY, LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY
   OR MRCC ROME, INMARSAT: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2891/22.
